name: Loops
description: Iteration with q:loop - arrays, ranges, and lists

examples.title: Counter
examples.sourceCode:
Counter Example

Counter: {count}

This is a simple counter example.

After increment: {count}

Loop iteration: {i}

examples.title: Loop All Types
examples.output:
[
  "Range loop:",
  "  i = 1",
  "  i = 2",
  "  i = 3",
  "Range with step:",
  "  n = 0",
  "  n = 2",
  "  n = 4",
  "  n = 6",
  "  n = 8",
  "  n = 10",
  "Array loop:",
  "  fruit = apple",
  "  fruit = banana",
  "  fruit = cherry",
  "List loop:",
  "  color = red",
  "  color = green",
  "  color = blue",
  "List with delimiter:",
  "  item = one",
  "  item = two",
  "  item = three"
]
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Loop All Types -->
<!-- Demonstrates all q:loop types -->
<q:component name="TestLoopAllTypes" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">

  <q:set name="output" type="array" value="[]" />

  <!-- Range loop: from/to -->
  <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="Range loop:" />
  <q:loop type="range" var="i" from="1" to="3">
    <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="  i = {i}" />
  </q:loop>

  <!-- Range loop with step -->
  <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="Range with step:" />
  <q:loop type="range" var="n" from="0" to="10" step="2">
    <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="  n = {n}" />
  </q:loop>

  <!-- Array loop: iterating over array -->
  <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="Array loop:" />
  <q:loop type="array" var="fruit" items='["apple", "banana", "cherry"]'>
    <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="  fruit = {fruit}" />
  </q:loop>

  <!-- List loop: comma-separated string -->
  <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="List loop:" />
  <q:loop type="list" var="color" items="red,green,blue">
    <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="  color = {color}" />
  </q:loop>

  <!-- List loop with custom delimiter -->
  <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="List with delimiter:" />
  <q:loop type="list" var="item" items="one|two|three" delimiter="|">
    <q:set name="output" operation="append" value="  item = {item}" />
  </q:loop>

  <q:return value="{output}" />
</q:component>

examples.title: Loop Array Index
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Array Loop with Index -->
<q:component name="TestArrayLoopIndex" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:loop type="array" var="fruit" index="idx" items='["apple", "banana", "orange"]'>
    <q:return value="Item" />
  </q:loop>
</q:component>

examples.title: Loop Array
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Array Loop -->
<q:component name="TestArrayLoop" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:loop type="array" var="fruit" items='["apple", "banana", "orange"]'>
    <q:return value="Fruit" />
  </q:loop>
</q:component>

examples.title: Loop List Delimiter
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test List Loop with Custom Delimiter -->
<q:component name="TestListLoopDelimiter" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:loop type="list" var="name" items="JoÃ£o|Maria|Pedro" delimiter="|">
    <q:return value="Name" />
  </q:loop>
</q:component>

examples.title: Loop List
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test List Loop -->
<q:component name="TestListLoop" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:loop type="list" var="color" items="red,green,blue">
    <q:return value="Color" />
  </q:loop>
</q:component>

examples.title: Loop Range Step
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Range Loop with Step -->
<q:component name="TestRangeLoopStep" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:loop type="range" var="i" from="1" to="10" step="2">
    <q:return value="Odd number" />
  </q:loop>
</q:component>

examples.title: Loop Range
examples.sourceCode:
<!-- Test Range Loop -->
<q:component name="TestRangeLoop" xmlns:q="https://quantum.lang/ns">
  <q:loop type="range" var="i" from="1" to="3">
    <q:return value="Number" />
  </q:loop>
</q:component>
